comment.author: 39294426@N06
comment._content: Would anyone know if the '20 painted on the basketball is the year the girls are graduating? Thank you!

comment.author: 39294426@N06
comment._content: P.S. If possible, please refer to the September 20, 1909 issue of The Saturday Evening Post.; the cover is by Carol Aus. It's an amazing illustration of a gil basketball player--probably a college student.
